name: VIDEO_STOPPED
description:
Occurs when the video stops playing.Deprecated:
  Deprecated as of v2.4.1. Please use LOCAL_VIDEO_STATE_CHANGED(0) in the LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_STOPPED callback instead.
       
   
   The application can use this callback to change the configuration of the view (for example, displaying other pictures in the view) after the video stops playing.
